text: Sun Senlin (born 25 March 1968) is a Chinese rower. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Sun Senlin
